description: The suicide rate of U.S. troops returning home is rising. We talk with Joshua Phillips, author of None of Us […]
contentencoded: The suicide rate of U.S. troops returning home is rising. We talk with Joshua Phillips, author of None of Us Were Like This Before, about the psychological impact of torture on the American soldiers who committed it.
